overview_of_class:
RTVF 365-2 Writers' Studio II

This course is exclusively available to School of Communication seniors admitted to the Creative Writing for the Media Module. The two course module sequence concludes this quarter with Writers' Studio II. Student focus will be on completion of their capstone portfolios and all other module requirements.
name: Writers Studio II
title: SoC RTVF 365-2-20 Writers Studio II
